text: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead
author: Oscar Wilde

text: A dream doesn’t become reality through magic; it takes sweat, determination, and hard work
author: Colin Powell

text: Music is the soul of language
author: Max Handel

text: You become responsible, forever, for what you have tamed
author: Antoine Saint-Exupery

text: It is not our abilities that show what we truly are. It is our choices
author: J. K. Rowling

text: Don’t let the muggles get you down
author: Ron Weasley (J.K.Rowling)

text: It is my belief that the truth is generally preferable to lies
author: Albus Dumbledore (J.K.Rowling)

text: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
author: J.K.Rowling

text: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
author: Albus Dumbledore (J.K.Rowling)

text: Things we lose have a way of coming back to us in the end, if not always in the way we expect.
author: Luna Lovegood (J.K.Rowling)

text: Anything’s possible if you’ve got enough nerve
author: J.K.Rowling

text: Though no one can go back and make a brand new start, anyone can start from now and make a brand new ending
author: Carl Bard

text: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful
author: Joshua J. Marine

text: The best revenge is massive success
author: Frank Sinatra

text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle
author: Steve Jobs

text: Success consists of going from failure to failure without loss of enthusiasm
author: Winston Churchill

text: Everyone is the creator of one’s own fate
author: Unknown

text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success
author: Herman Cain

text: Nothing is impossible, the word itself says, I’m possible!
author: Коулмен Хокинс

text: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% of how I react to it
author: Charles Swindoll

text: Be happy for this moment. This moment is your life
author: Omar Khayyam
